txt.en:
'Each of the Gaunt-lords you defeated held mastery over a particular facet of the offensive planned by Gortheron: Thadúr the Ravager, master of poison; Ferndúr the Virulent, master of plague; Drugoth the Death-monger, master of fear. You did not encounter Ivar the Blood-hand, but he is the master of war.

'Together, with Gortheron, they are five. Five Gaunt-lords made in mockery of the five Wizards. Gortheron has corrupted these sprawling ruins, making of them a home for the servants of the Gaunt-lords.

'The door into the central area is sealed; if you are able to defeat the minions of Gortheron in each of the side wings, we may be able to open the central area and challenge Gortheron directly.'
'The door to the central area is open, [placeholder]. You will find Gortheron within.'
'Explore the two side wings of Ost Dunhoth, and we can work to unseal the central area.'
The Ranger Túgonn has told you that the door into the central area of Ost Dunhoth is locked and can only be opened by exploring the side wings.
Survive the wages of war and conquer your fear in the east wing
Ost Dunhoth has two wings that must be explored before the central area can be unsealed.
Survive the spread of plague and poison in the west wing
Túgonn is in the entrance of Ost Dunhoth.\n\nYou have conquered two wings of Ost Dunhoth and should return now to Túgonn.
